nodes.text: The Tome of the Hieroprince was a religious text used by the Opaline Creed faction on the planet Crucival, based around the Hieroprince, an individual part of the Creed's religion. Hazram Namir, a member of the Creed who was known as Umu Seven, constantly read the Tome of the Hieroprince during his time as part of the faction in 4 BBY.
The Tome of the Hieroprince was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
